main event: Three objects were sighted near LaGuardia Airport in New York City on 22 August 1954.
interesting points: The sighting included two blinking lights observed at an altitude of 30,000 feet for about 20 seconds., The report concluded that the observations were balloons., The objects were described as a tear-drop shape and round aluminum in color., The sightings were reported multiple times near the airport., Weather conditions during the sighting were clear with high stratus clouds.
sighted object: two blinking lights and three unidentified objects
witness description: report from LaGuardia Airfort, involving observations by military personnel
